revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Control4 |model=C4-DSC-EN-INT |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/29/2012 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=interior door station |fcc_id=R33C4DSCINT |ic_id=7848A-C4DSCINT |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} May be sold by '''Cisco''' as the SCH-VDS-I.
"DPO35 BCM11211 X03" is silkscreened on the control module. This would seem to indicate the device uses the [https://www.broadcom.com/products/Applications-and-Multimedia-Processors/Tablet-Application-Processors/BCM11211 '''Broadcom''' BCM11211] Persona Media Processor.
"DPO35 PWR X03" is silkscreened on the power module.
This device has a built-in camera. There is an antenna connector for the Wi-Fi on the control module.
